title: Evolving
alt: Biologists play reverse Pok√©mon, trying to avoid putting any one team member on the front lines long enough for the experience to cause evolution.
transcript:
[Bacterial cell culture.]
What?
Staphylococcus aureus is evolving!...Off-screen: Aww, crap.
Staphylococcus aureus evolved into Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus!
